website_summaries.verdict: A masticating dual-stage extractor that can handle nearly any kind of fruit or vegetable and perform other kitchen tasks.
pros: Low speed of 80 RPM prevents oxidation to maintain healthy enzymes
Dual-stage extraction allows for greater juice yield
Can juice fruits, vegetables, and leafy greens, as well as grind coffee and spices, extrude pasta, and make nut butters, baby food, and frozen desserts
cons: Plastic components may not be as durable as some owners would like

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Unpleasant Smell excessive heating n smoke High vibration & very noisy. Will not prefer Omega juicer in future.
customer_reviews.author: SACHIN PRAJAPATI

customer_reviews.title: Came in broken
customer_reviews.text: Not happy Revised review 2/28/19 Although the juicer works ok but in 2 weeks on use the body of juicer started making screaching noise. Even after reporting that the part came in broken the distributor didnt contact or offered for a relacement. However amazon customer service waa A+ and was very helpful. Thank u amazon customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shobaa S.

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After lot of research I bought this unit before a month or so. Liked it initially...it broke when we were using it for the 10th time. We were juicing spinach and suddenly we heard a cracking sound and we looked into the juice, we found small plastic piece. I will not recommend this product at all since it's dangerous if plastic breaks and you end up consuming.
customer_reviews.author: jigar_pandya

customer_reviews.title: That it's well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to juice carrots and it didn't last two months before the cone broke and Amazon wants $50.00 to replace it. Cheaply made for something so expensive. I will have to pay for the part but I won't buy Omega again. I went to the Omega website ($30.00 for the same cone) but they won't let you see what shipping will cost you without giving them all your information. I have to believe they're going to SPAM me even if I purchase it from them. I don't like their predatory sales. I just want to juice my carrots and be left alone.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Group Fan

customer_reviews.title: You will get a electric shock
customer_reviews.text: Got a electric shock while using it ....stuck while jucing
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Product has plastic parts that only lasted 4 months then broke. For the cost of this item I thought it would be better I emailed company for warranty but have not heard back
customer_reviews.author: Steven Grubb

customer_reviews.title: DO NO BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I LOST $350 ON THIS JUICER PURCHASED THROUGH AMAZON. THEIR RETURN POLICY DOES NOT ALLOW RETURNS. I PLUGGED IT IN OUT OF THE BOX, BRAND NEW, TURNED IT ON AND MOTOR DID NOT ENGAGE THE AUGER. INSTEAD IS BEGAN TO SMOKE. IT DOES NOT WORK. THE WORST PART IS THAT THEY DO NOT ALLOW RETURNS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats the Old Centrifugal Juicer by a Mile
customer_reviews.text: We've used an Omega 1000 (centrifugal juicer) daily for over 30 years and always liked it. Increasingly, however, it would easily get out of balance and require that I hold it down while my wife fed it. After considerable research, I bought the Omega NC900HDC. My only regret is that I suffered so long with the old juicer. This juicer does everything better and faster. It extracts more juice, is quieter, does everything from pineapple to carrots to kale with ease, is a breeze to cleanup, and doesn't warm the juice.
customer_reviews.author: PCH66

customer_reviews.title: No support if there is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Machines auger wobbled a bit but it still worked the first few times. Then the screen around it (plastic Frame) I notice broke. Called company. They said to email them and gave me an email address. I did this twice with no response. I am Going to update post with pictures. Note: this is my first poor review on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIFIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer less than a year ago (over $350?). A small plastic part that attaches the drum/hopper to the motor housing broke. The product was still under warranty. I called to replace the drum. I was willing to purchase it -- waiving the warranty. 20 phone calls and 10 emails later, I have STILL not heard back from Omega Customer service. I am discgusted beyond words with this company. Product works great until something breaks, after which point you might as well trash it. NEVER AGAIN will I purchase another Omega product! NEVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pieces of plastic wearing off strainer
customer_reviews.text: Pieces of plastic are wearing and falling off being pulverized in my juice. Rip off. How awful for $400!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Poor Parts ! Do not buy if you are planning to juice everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Poor parts easily brooken, really disappointed with the product. Motor is good but the parts are poor. Most of the part Cracked after 7 month of use. I use this only for the fruits and green jucing. Amazon has replace it with new one , let see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knows how long it will last?
customer_reviews.text: Other than being made of plastic, it seems to do a decent job. Bulky and the attachments are a pain to store, but cleaning them is not difficult. It is a decent product. UPDATE February 18, 2019 Still going strong. Solved the problem of storing all of the attachments....purchased a small plastic bin container with lid from local store and now just keep them all in there when not in use. The auger is showing NO signs of wear, fading, cracking etc. I am still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A juicer's dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: This Omega Juicer has been advertised as the cat's meow, and it truly is. My girlfriend and I are so excited about this new addition to our kitchen and hopefully healthier lifestyle. Ever since we got it, we've been juicing pretty much every day, and true to form it juices pretty much everything, from dandelions to carrots, beets .... well everything within reach. I also tried some nut butter, which seemed more of a chore. Tasted nice, but took a while, and the clean up was somewhat messy, so I'm not so sure if I will attempt making my own nut butter from scratch again anytime soon. Everything else .. a dream come true!
customer_reviews.author: BlüMüsiK

customer_reviews.title: Plastic breaks and stains after two years of use
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I used this daily doing the Gerson Therapy for two years. It did a good job juicing, but I've had to replace some of the parts due to them breaking. Plus, I've been unable to remove the staining on the plastic no matter what I try. Customer service's advice didn't help... I see there's a kit for $85. Amazon's Choice juicer is around $114. These juicers cost $400. If I knew then what I know now I'd try the Amazon one. The best feature on this is the size of the chute so you don't have to cut your produce first.
customer_reviews.author: TH9500

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased. This juicer is powerful and has never failed on anything I've made with it, including using it for fruit, vegetables, making nut butters, and grinding meats! This juicer is extraordinarily quiet compared to the centrifugal juicer I also own. This juicer cleans up in a breeze. If you are diligent and put it under running warm water before any particles have time to dry, you can clean out non-oily things like fruits and vegetables with simple running water. Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: We are SO pleased with our Omega
customer_reviews.text: We are SO pleased with our Omega! We have used it to juice, make fresh fruit ice-cream, make nut butters & fettuccine noodles. It has met all of my expectations and it is so easy to take apart, clean and put back together. I have owned a commercial Champion juicer and was frustrated with it on many occasions. We love that the Rpms are so low on this juicer and helps keeps the nutrients longer. LOVE LOVE LOVE this juicer!! The only thing I'm frustrated with is that the book that came with it shows and talks about a strainer, but ours didn't come with a strainer nor can we find one on amazon to purchase additionally.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffini D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with missing parts.. have to go pay $110 extra for them. Save yourself money and headache and get a different juicer
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought the NC900 juicer "You purchased this item on September 17, 2018"; 1/29/19, the jucing screen cracked juicing wheatgrass, WHAT? Love the juicer but surprised this happened and disappointed - this juicer is not cheap. I had a Breville for 15 years and still working. I really want to love the Omega 900. I can't even find the part for this model on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinta

customer_reviews.title: Parts scratched
customer_reviews.text: Mostly vegetable. I've had it for a year now and this part is scratched,you can see the paint coming off. I feel like everytime I juice I'm drinking the paint .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Prince

customer_reviews.title: Good Bet For A Macerating Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the juicer squeezes the maximum amount of juice out of the fruits and veggies, and the fact that it doesn’t produce large amounts of foam. I don’t agree with some of the other reviews that suggest that the screen is fragile. I use a toothbrush to clean the screen under running water. I wish the parts were stainless steel instead of plastic. I also think that the direction booklet is pretty weak, as it doesn’t clearly say how to dial the power for different fruits and veggies, and how to the machine apart and clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Dhamilton

customer_reviews.title: O.M.G. This juicer is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I wanted in a juicer and so I did a lot of research to figure-out which juicer would have it all. The NC900HDC does! It’s very stylish; quiet; super easy to put together and take apart to clean; has 5 settings for hard vegetables and soft fruit; has clear containers to catch the juice and the pulp; came wrapped very securely; and is already an important part of my healing! Paid more than I wanted to but I feel it’s worth every penny. I’m really thankful that YouTube had so many helpful videos!!
customer_reviews.author: CoyoteDreams

customer_reviews.title: This is my first masticating juicer and I love it. I made a human error when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first masticating juicer and I love it. I made a human error when I first started using it, contacted the seller and they were excellent in helping me and I got replacement parts from Omega in no time. I just had to email pictures of the broken parts. You will not regret your purchase. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Priscek

customer_reviews.title: Simply love it.
customer_reviews.text: We are convinced this is the best juice maker we've ever had. Improves our previous Omega 8005 (which is still perfect after 3 years of frequent use) and goes to our daughter. Wider feeder neck, strong and effective, delicious juice, and the simplest juicer to clean and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JorgeR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect juicer
customer_reviews.text: We just started juicing and after a LOT of research, decided to go with this juicer. It's easy to set up and clean. I've been making juices for the family everyday. For kids, I make carrot, orange, apple and beets juice. For me and my husband, I add celery, broccoli, ginger, bell peppers. It's so easy. I make a huge batch each morning and store in mason jars for the day. Highly recommend this juicer over others.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: main juice part cracked! no replacements
customer_reviews.text: I buy this juicer and there's no way to get a new part that busted after 10 times using it! it was ginger that busted it!
customer_reviews.author: KYLE GOODMAN

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer under $500
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! After paying $100s for another cleanse I started researching how to make them myself and all the different juicers. I talked to my husband and we decided to use our wedding funds to purchase this. It has more than paid for itself and now I can juice to maintain my weight and feel a million times better whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Over rated
customer_reviews.text: Had the NC900HD for 7 months and it's been down for repairs/parts twice now. Omega is terrible at getting back to you and keeping the warranty process flowing. Not worth the price and the customer service is terrible over at Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product les then 90 days ago and the piece that grinds the vegetables broke off and pieces of plastic actually went into my juice. As you can see in the picture other then the large piece that broke it was slowly grinding away and I was lucky to notice when I did. I contacted Angel Seller and they would not refund. They stated "I mean it is defective when you use it and it is not damaged when you receive it". Not sure how anyone could trust this not to happen again but they still did not offer a refund even though its under the 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Merced

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. It is my first juicer and I am very impressed with it. A family member had a centrifugal juicer and it does not compare. Worth the price if you have the cash. It is very quite and efficient. Soft fruits can be somewhat of an issue but overall a great juicer. If you are looking to start getting your health back this can really help. I thought clean up was a breeze. Way easier than any blender. Easy to assemble. It does take up some counter space but if you use it consistently it is well worth it. I use this almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kosmos99

customer_reviews.title: a good machine that has lasted me one year already with no problems
customer_reviews.text: my reason for the three stars is that this is not really well-made. The machine is in chrome and all the chrome plastic which breaks very easily. As far as the motor goes, it is not that powerful. I have actually stop the motor from running with something as little as spinach pushing it down the chute of the hopper. still it does work, but if you're looking for something more durable, by an American-made one.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This juicer does exactly what i expect it to. Its top of the line and gets a great amount of juice from items. I wish it was a little taller so that the extracted juice container could hold more juice. Id like to juice for the family in one go but the small container makes that impossible. But no other problems. Its wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My New Drinking Partner!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, the NC900!! It’s sleek and beautiful, sturdy... and most importantly works like a charm!!! Anything I juice... easy peazy! The motor is q...u...i...e....t..... And everything tastes outstandingly delicious. Like wowza! Delicious! I’m thrilled with this purchase. And the clean up... so easy! I thought I was doing something wrong! Much easier than cleaning my vita-mixer. I researched a lot of juicers before purchasing this one... and to be fair... there are some good contenders... so needs... your needs should always factor into your buying choices.. that said, this juicer is versitile, pretty... can one call an appliance pretty?! Well I just did... and able to juice like a Queen. My new drinking partner!! Lol! Cheer! everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Blank-Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed I only had this juicer for 2 weeks and the drum part isn’t sealing right and it gets juice where there should be no juice the snout moves slightly up and down. It does juice but for this price I expect no problem for the 1st year.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy smith

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice juicer. Works well
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice juicer. Works well. Juicer tends to tip forward while pushing produce through feed chute. Juice screen fell apart after two months of use. I will contact Omega to see if they will warranty the juice screen. The black ring is supposed to be attached to the screen assembly. it just falls off with no resistance. If I can't get the part warranted I am looking at another $30.00 for one off the Omega site. Amazon wants $68.00. The Juicer still works, just takes more time to deal with the broken juice screen.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Max

customer_reviews.title: Too much plastic, but really good juice.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the most part. Parts do seem a little cheap and plastic-y, as the "ice-cream" adapter broke on first use when we were pushing frozen fruit through it. It always looks like the plastic will just blow apart at any given moment...but so far everything else seems to hold together. The results are delicious though!
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creating natural cold press juices at home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for creating natural cold press juices at home. websiteof mfgr provide the recipies. The unit powers through consistently on all ingredients-fruit and vegetables. Feedertube is wide enough for all items without too much slicing. The nesting nature of the juice cup and the compost cup is a benefit to ensure evertyhing goes in the right bocket while the machine is on. Have been using hte Omega juuicer for over a month every day making 3-4 juices at a time Very satisfied with the Omega Juicer.
customer_reviews.author: STW

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever. Reliable Brand.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer rocks. Almost 5 years now of regular use and it’s still working perfectly and juicing wonderfully. Omega products are reliable. I spoke so much about my juicer that many of my friends ended up purchasing it. I even suggest this same machine to people in my audience when I’m giving health talks. If I have to purchase another one it’ll surely be this again.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment of my life.
customer_reviews.text: I literally make 3 to 5 juices a day 5 times a week. Cleaning a juicer was NEVER so easy. I was so worried that cleaning it would consume my life and OMG it doesn't. I had bought another brand in the past, also masticating juicer, super capacity but cleaning was the worst thing to the point I returned it. I bought this one because Johnny Juice a raw vegan recommended it. Instagram. Follow him!
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. worth every penny. I've juiced every day since getting this about a month ago. Flawlessly designed. Very easy to clean because the plastic is of very high quality. The unit "feels" durable and well-made. Cleans up in about two minutes (but do it immediately or soak it until ready.) Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: It arrived five days ago and my wife and I have experimented with green drinks (different combinations of carrots, kale, romaine,cucumber, parsley, lemon, ginger, and apple). The juicer has worked great. It's fun to watch the ingredients get processed by the augur. It is a snap to clean up. For the last few days my wife has been processing wheatgrass and it works perfectly for that. We still have a Breville centrifugal juicer, but I have put it back in the box and may never take it out again. So far, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chrowl

customer_reviews.title: The juicer works well
customer_reviews.text: The clear juice container was delivered cracked. I ordered a replacement container (probably a $2.00 part) and Amazon sent an entire new juicer, and payment was due on the second juicer as well. This juicer replacement came with another cracked juice container. I will just use a glass bowl to collect the juice. The service rep. was not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for juicing... warranty isn't worth the paper it's written on
customer_reviews.text: The juicer works beautifully. Juices everything we put in. Will jam up or clog, but the reverse button clears it easily. Easy to clean. So why only three stars: Unfortunately the screen insert has already broken. I have contacted the company 5 times and have not rec'd a reply. I will end up having to buy a new part. I finally received a reply from the company. They sent not 1, but 2 new front screens. Both have worked flawlessly. I haven't used the unit for everything that it claims it will do, but it does juice well... so I"m improving my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Berube

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Using 2-3 times a week. Each session about 2 hours long. Lots of juicing. Unit does get hot if running for that length of time. Touchable, but HOT. Take 5 min here and there and it will be fine. Leafy greens comes out dried with setting @ 5. Everything else is set at 4/4.5. Cucumbers give lots of juice. Always run something solid @ the end to push everything through. Carrots works the best. Also great for crushing. Like Yucca, and dried coconut meat. They come out shredded to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: JaSon

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING !!! -It never cease to amaze, how this machine extracts considerable amounts of juice from the tiniest of leaves, such as parsley. Bits & pieces of spinach -'NO PROBLEM', blades of wheatgrass - 'NO PROBLEM'. It even processes the hard stuff, like carrots, without a challenge. Then the extra dryness of the pulp exiting the machine, gives assurance that you're getting great yields. I do find that when juicing cucumbers or apples, you'll need to put a few pieces at a time; then follow with other veggies to push the liquid along. But that's a small price to pay for everything else this machine puts out.
customer_reviews.author: GERARD DELVA, JR.

customer_reviews.title: Most every day.
customer_reviews.text: After preparing the vegetables and fruits, this juicer takes care of business. It does not bog down on raw beets and laughs at large carrots. Using a strainer for the final pour, makes a good breakfast. Mostly, only water and mild soap to clean and a simple wipe down to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Texascook

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is easy to clean and easy to use. I researched juicers before making this purchase because I didn't want to have to replace it a year after I bought one. I am very happy with this. It is really quiet and easier than I expected. It takes more time to prep the fruit and veggies than it does to actually juice! Cleaning is easy too. I take it apart and just rinse if I'm going to use again in the morning. But give it a thorough wash every other day. So far, I do not have anything bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: photogirl

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, effective & easy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this juicer for celery and wheat grass, which are tough on lesser machines do to the fiber content. This one breaks it down with ease, and it’s super easy to clean. I haven’t timed it, but I estimate that it takes me about 10 minutes to get out the celery, rinse it, assemble juicer, juice, clean and put all the clean, wet parts on the drying rack. I’ve had 3 juicers: an old-school champion, a lower-end Omega, and this one. The others were a pain in the arse to clean and didn’t perform nearly as well. Buy this juicer and send me a thank you card. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very good juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is excellent for green juices. I have only had it for a month or so, but I juiced a lot and it really produces delicious, cold juice. The instructions indicate proper usage and I would suggest following them very closely as overloading any sort of motor will eventually burn it out. Cleaning the parts is basically rinsing them with water with a bit of brushing on the actual filter. It’s quiet and consistent. I will eventually use it for other purposes but I needed to juice cabbage and it did an excellent job for that and for the other juices I made!
customer_reviews.author: D. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to start a new diet that involved juicing vegetables and my biggest concern was finding a product that could handle them and last me a good amount of time. I couldn't have found a better juicer than the Omega! It's durable, easy to put together and take apart, and has shown no signs of slowing down since purchasing it over a month ago. Being my first appliance purchase, I couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: More than I wanted to spend but very worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on slow cold press juicers before purchasing this. I've had this for a year now and the thing is a tank that just keeps goin! I mainly use it for juicing celery and the quality of the juice in unbeatable compared to other juicers. It's also a very versatile machine as you can use it to make pasta, sorbet making, almond milk, etc. Also can't go wrong with Omega's warantee.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great for celery!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new juicer that could handle celery. My old juicer could not manage it and would constantly get jammed but this one juices celery without any problems! The majority of the fiber is quite dry and it is a snap to clean up. It maybe takes 45 seconds to a minute and everything is clean. I highly recommend this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: opinionated gal from DC

customer_reviews.title: Used it for juices, nut butters, sorbets, wheat milk, soy milk.
customer_reviews.text: I like the large feeding mouth, the easiness of cleaning and the smooth sound that’s reminding me every time: all the enzymes are here, intact. Fantastic options with pulp or no pulp. The juices stay clear and no sedimentation if one sort fruit of veggie is used at one time and chose no pulp option. If pulp is added or a blend a fruit, separation will occur due to gravity but shake it and enjoy it. The most I kept it for was 3 days, as a fruit blend, some pulp, in a glass bottle in the fridge. As good as the first day. Thank you. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Condurache

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas gift (received a used, unclean juicer)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer as a Christmas gift. Paid full price for the brand new one. Everyone was super excited until we opened the box. It had a weird moldy smell inside, the main body of the juicer was very dirty and had white water marks, other small parts had bits of carrots on it. I did not bother to open the rest. I have returned the juicer but with all the prebuilt hype and enthusiasm around the gift, the Christmas celebration was a little tainted.
customer_reviews.author: amzn cust

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. I have tried making green juice, almond milk, minced meat and variety of fruit juices. I even made rice noodles. Everything results in perfect texture and taste. Our whole family enjoys recipes made from this machine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I write this review while drinking a juice cocktail of beets, kale, carrots, apples, ginger, pineapple, kiwi, and bell pepper. It may sound gross but it is amazing. Since buying this juicer I have tried to juice pretty much every fruit and vegetable I can find. It does an amazing job especially with leafy greens, which when using a blender usually end up as shredded particulates in the juice. It’s pretty fast for a masticating juicer and has a quiet motor. For a juice lover, this is a healthy alternative to store bought juice. Seriously, juice an apple and taste it, it is way better than what you get in the store!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Niyati Walker

customer_reviews.title: Well built and strong
customer_reviews.text: It works! I had bought a less expensive juicer and I wanted to like it for its price, since I thought it was what I could afford. After a short time it just quit working. So I waited a while to review this one. It powers through carrots, beets, limes, greens, everything I put in it it juices. It never struggles. I'm so happy happy happy. Find the money and buy quality, you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Kangas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy unit! We love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! So many possible uses ! I have 2 Breville cold juicers work well just for juicing veggies and fruits! This Omega extractor, mint,spice mincing, pasta, coffee grinder, baby food maker, almond/soy milk,nutbutters& sorbet is my favorite! Thanks .
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: I HATE THIS JUICER
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated. The parts don't easily conjoin. I have spent a month wrestling with this piece of machinery and have had to walk away in frustration repeatedly. I hate it!!! $400 down the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheaper mainstream centrifugal juicer for about 3 months before this. There is no comparison. If you select no pulp, the waste is almost bone dry. You won’t regret the higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Deane Karstaedt

customer_reviews.title: Not compliant for Australia
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the product was sent to Australia and was not electrically compliant. Now I am out of pocket by well over $100 in postage costs Before purchase the fact that it runs on a different voltage than Australia should have been highlighted. Will be purchasing products elsewhere from now on
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. I have a Green Star Elite that will likely never be used again after getting this. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nagel

customer_reviews.title: I just love my new juicer
customer_reviews.text: Just received it a couple of days ago and I use it every day sometimes twice a day.♥️♥️♥️♥️I had another one and had to stop it in the middle of my juicing and unclog it but NOT this one so far. Going to make some sorbet now. I juiced three bags of greens from my garden this morning. I juice celery every morning. Can’t wait to make pasta. Hope this all keeps up with my new juicer. So excited
customer_reviews.author: Stephani Mikeska

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had a prior version of this juicer but like this a little better because of the larger throat which makes it quicker and easier to process the vegetables. I purchased the chrome but realized later that the other finish would probably have been fine and would have gone with my kitchen as well as the chrome - it would have saved money also. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: A great improvement over the last version. My parents have the previous version of this juicer and it got clogged more often and the hole was more narrow so you had to cut everything into very small pieces, this new machine is a beast... the footprint is a little bit bigger on the countertop but the new design elements are a big improvement and gives me more juice, fresher, and faster!
customer_reviews.author: backpacker238

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer ever!! Technology has finally caught up with juicing! This machine is sleek, efficient and easy to clean. Forget the juicer of your past this is an entirely new experience. Truly a life changer for me. I feel amazing after just one week of juicing
customer_reviews.author: annette annechild

customer_reviews.title: I love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best juicer I have used! It gets the job done coupled with the fact that it looks stunning! It makes juicing fun for me and the clean up is easy plus you have few parts to clean. Once, I told my friend about it she bought one on the spot and she has been juicing happily since then. My sister has a $2600 juicer but I prefer this juicer to hers! If you are looking for a good juicer, let this be your last stop! I want to seize this opportunity to say, "Thank you" to the makers of this fantastic juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jucing lyfe4eva
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's a bit pricey, but it is well worth it. I make a giant thing of juice for the week. Making that means Its running for about 45 mins to an hour, and it does get hot, but not too bad. However, I will say that if you were going to be running it longer, I'd spring for one a bit better. Definitely only for personal use. But its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! Now make a healthy life easier.
customer_reviews.text: Best possible blender you can get! It’s a must have a juicer and processor in one it may be on the high price side but it’s 100% worth it! Your basically paying for two machines in one. high quality last forever best warranty you can get. I juice knowing that I’m getting all the nutrients possible! Almond milk and nut butters it’s the perfect kitchen tool have for those who are health nuts this machine makes it so much easier to get things done in a timely manner❤️❤️❤️ I could go on and on I looove this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: azalea

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with a juicer, but it works great! I have not used wheatgrass, but the omega 900 does a wonderful job with kale, spinach, celery, cukes, ginger, green apples, beets, lemon (peeled), carrots, etc! Love, love the fresh juice and the Easy to clean parts!!
customer_reviews.author: Lex's mom

customer_reviews.title: Slow is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and Omega kept coming up so decided to give it a try. Very happy. Easy to assemble/disassemble and clean. Very quiet, produces a very dry pulp so know we are getting the most juice.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Great for the vegetables with lots of fiber but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the vegetables with lots of fiber but not so great for fruits with lots of juice. Hard to extract juice when not enough fiber is there ie orange, water melon, apple...
customer_reviews.author: SangHo Park

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my fiancé are so in love with this juicer. We juice minimum twice a day and we are so addicted to it now. I was never a big fan of juicers because it would take forever to clean them, but one major advantage of this amazing juicer is that cleaning & washing the parts is so easy that you won't even believe. Many thanks to this company for bringing this into our lives :)
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refurbed unit. As good as new. Works well but is slow and cleanup is a bit of a task. There are times when a centrifugal would work better but overall, the masticating juicer gives you more juice out of the vegetable, especially greens like kale, celery and spinach.
customer_reviews.author: william weihrouch

customer_reviews.title: Capable Juicer
customer_reviews.text: The feeder pipe is too narrow. One has to cut vegetables into very small pieces. It takes too long to prepare vegetables and fruits prior to juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle T

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I guess, I had to pay the price. This is the 3rd one I tried and finally the one that works. Love that it can extract juice from the vegetable leaves. Very easy to clean and does not create so much mess than the others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Karika

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: We received our juicer today, opened it up and the front has scratches all over it. We are very disappointed. We will be returning and exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: ed green

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: this juicer is wonderful! I was a bit skeptical because I thought it would be a one time thing but since we purchased it we've been making juices every other day, about a gallon in one shot. We use all different types of fruits and vegetables including beets, carrots, kale, spinach, parsley, anything that normally my 14 year old wouldn't eat but he likes the juices. We usually use a pineapple as a base and that juicer works wonders. Very easy to clean and assemble. Worth every penny. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: boguslaw turczynski

customer_reviews.title: At first very happy but after a month of use it feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: At first very happy but after a month of use it feels like the fruits and vegetables don't move through the juicer as smoothly they now tend to build up at the entrance when reaching the auger. (have even attempted to cut into smaller pieces) Happy with juicing!
customer_reviews.author: Jericho

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise this is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer really gives you more juice with less vegetables. As an avid morning juicee I have used many types of juicers but this one fits the bill. I am quite impressed with its foamless and sediment free juices, which suites me quite well. However, I wish the chute was larger to accommodate larger vegetables. Otherwise this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Raneque Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is awesome! I just started juicing in January 2018 with a centrifugal juicer and I felt that a lot of produce was being wasted so I upgraded to this one and it was so worth it! More juice, less waste and even the quality of juice is better. It's relatively quiet and very easy to clean. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: HopperstadSPI

customer_reviews.title: does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Glad I spent the money for this one. The local wheat grass store recommended it (after I already bought it). It's great for wheat grass and other solid veggies. Spinach is a little foamy. clean up isn't bad. I rinse and dry it in a few minutes and only usually need the brush for the metal mesh. I also feel better drinking greens every day. I'm not sure I would like one with a narrower throat.
customer_reviews.author: Jib

customer_reviews.title: It does it all. Milks nuts too
customer_reviews.text: Excellent juicer. We've tried others and this juicer by far is worth the money. We use it daily and has been running very well. We'll see if it lasts the test of time but the company does offer a good warranty so that's reassuring.
customer_reviews.author: Ostrich Prime

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's easy to set up, tear down, and clean. I've been able to juice all variety of fruit and vegetables with no problems at all. I even got a bag of frozen pineaplle and ran that through and it comes out like sorbet. My kids love it. I looked at a lot of more "affordable" juicers and read and watched several reviews before deciding on this one. All I can say is, I'm very happy with my purchase. It's a quality piece of equipment and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that in the event of an emergency where we had to leave our home, the one thing I’d take with me is our juicer... he’s 100% correct! I can’t say enough good things about this juicer. We have another one at our other property and although I really like that one too, nothing compares to the Omega!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and assemble, quite, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in excellent shape. I have been using this juicer daily since I got it mainly to juice celery. I have tried other juicers and found this one the easiest to clean and assemble. I am very pleased with this purchase, I know it’s expensive but if you’re like me who’s serious about juicing and sticks to a routine, this is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: maria kathleen martin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine, wonderful way to eat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. This juicer replaced a centrifugal juicer we have had for years. To clean the old one you had to deal with the really sharp cutters that invariably held food particle. This masticating unit disassembles easily and everything washes right up. I was surprised even the screen washes clean easily. My suggestion is to not let it sit without washing because many fruits and vegetables move in for the duration if allowed to dry. My wife and I have fully converted to juice for supper (evening meal) and find we feel much better, sleep better, and are losing weight. I don't see how anyone who does a little research wouldn't convert to juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Omega juicer makes life sweet
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. What a workhorse for our family. We are juicing a lot and our new Omega Juicer is the bomb. After watching "Fat Sick and Nearly Dead". I decided that health had to be a focus in my life. My wake up juice is so fresh clean and delicious that I rave about it to everyone I meet. The delicious dreamsickle is smooth and oh so fine. My daughter is even juicing. I can recommend this product to everyone. The cleanup takes a little time but I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Neukirch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, we love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this juicer, we bought it 5 years ago and it is still working perfectly. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wash and Cut your Veggies and Fruits before Juicing
customer_reviews.text: Love the juicer. I use it all the time. It really squeezes all the juice from the vegies and fruits. Just make sure you cut the hard veggies to small pieces. Just want to make sure you damage the juicer. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ligonde

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer I own and I’ve got FIVE! Owned an $800 for just a day before I returned it, this one blew it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Wright

customer_reviews.title: Parts are expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product for less than 3 months. The juice is great, and I like making peanut butter with it, but the non screen - blank cone broke after about 4 uses the plastic snapped making it unusable. The replacement part was $40 so I am kind of unhappy about that. I would return it if I could other than this I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High yield quality juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We’ve had it for a while and is by far the best juicer we’ve owned. We have had 0 issues or concerns with it. It has a plastic auger which initially was concerning for durability BUT has not let us down nor do we fell it will. It has high yield juice. We would highly recommend this juicer and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: emma holz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. So easy to use and clean. I have made celery juice, cucumber juice and a few others. So excited for the endless possibilities
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Halterman Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is one fantastic juicer. Very quiet, easy to use, creates a lot of juice. Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: David Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this juicer, it is my first one and I am not mechanically inclined, so I am happy with how easy it is to clean and assemble. I primarily got it to juice celery and it is working Great! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: mary ann chrzan

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: me and my wife love it. it's easy to clean and very powerful. we even like the recipes that come with the free recipe book. especially the cashew cookie dough cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A Millich II

customer_reviews.title: The pulp comes out suuuper dry!! AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: So before this one, I ordered as well the Lexen Healthy Juicer (manual), which works really well, but the Omega NC900HDC met every single expectation I had. It's of course way faster, really easy to clean AND it's super pretty :) A friend of mine said It looks like a fancy spatial dog LOL! The quality of the juice is fantastic plus I need less organic leafy greens to obtain around 400ml. The pulp comes out suuuper dry. Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: VIP Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is great. We’ve had it for a couple months. Ow and use it regularly. We wanted an extractor type and so it is slower than some, but it’s worth it to have juice you can keep a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, to use, to clean, blends perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a better juicer. It was worth the price. It's super easy to assemble, use and clean. The juices are perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: Omega NC900HDC Juicer Extractor and Nutrition Center Creates Fruit Vegetable and Wheatgrass Juice Quiet Motor Slow Masticating Dual-Stage Extraction with Adjustable Settings, 150-Watt, Metallic
product_meta.description: Omega's Nutrition Centers are "masticating-style" juice extracts and more. A masticating juicer juices at low speeds of 80 RPM minimizing heat build-up and oxidation. The auger system forces produce into a tight chamber, grinding and pressing the food to squeeze out the juice from items as fine as wheatgrass and leafy vegetables. With a Nutrition Center you can also make all-natural nut butters, baby food, soy milk, almond milk and a variety of healthy snacks. Includes 6 nozzles and 2 Juicing screens.
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15-YEAR WARRANTY covering parts and performance
LONGER LASTING JUICES: Using a low speed of 80 RPMs results in minimal heat buildup and oxidation promoting healthy enzymes
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES: Extracts the maximum amount of nutrients, vitamins, taste and juice from minimum amounts of fruits, vegetables, leafy greens, and wheatgrass
NUTRITION CENTER: Extrude pasta, grind coffee and spices, turn nuts into nut butter, make baby food and frozen desserts, mince herbs and garlic, and whip up soy milk in a flash
HIGHLIGHTS: The adjustable end cap has 5-settings for maximum juice output and extraction. Enjoy continuous juicing with automatic pulp ejection
POWER: Quiet but powerful motor with gear reduction equivalent of 2 HP motor
EASY TO USE: The size of the feed chute is larger compared to some Omega models, so you can spend less time prepping before juicing
Chrome finish, all components included, and built-in handle
110/120 Voltage. Dimensions-6 1⁄2 W x 14 1⁄2 D x 15 1⁄2 H inches. Weight-13 pounds. The juice and pulp cups are plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars922 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
